item.title: Google Acquires Startup Wiz for $32B to Make ‘Cybersecurity More Accessible And Simpler’

item.title: Research Eyes Misconfiguration Issues At Google, Amazon and Microsoft Cloud

item.title: Cloudflare is the Latest Tech Company to Adopt Content Credentials for Image Authenticity
item.description:

item.title: ChatGPT Cheat Sheet: A Complete Guide for 2025
item.description:
Get up and running with ChatGPT with this comprehensive cheat sheet. Learn everything from how to sign up for free to enterprise use cases, and start using ChatGPT quickly and effectively.

item.title: Google, Apple Under Investigation to Determine Compliance with New UK Competition Law
item.description:
If Google or Apple is deemed to have Strategic Market Status in the U.K., the government might force it to make the user data it collects available to competitors, or give publishers more control over how their data is used.

item.title: Operator: OpenAI’s Next Step Toward the ‘Agentic’ Future
item.description:
Operator and the Computer-Using Agent will be available through the OpenAI API at an undisclosed time.

item.title: ChatGPT Can Now Schedule Tasks in Advance
item.description:
The tasks feature, now in beta, can provide daily weather reports or send reminders.

item.title: Google Workspace Plans See Price Hike as Gemini AI Expands to All Tiers
item.description:
Instead of a $20 or $30 standalone plan, Google added a few dollars to its business tiers and applied the Gemini generative AI to all plans.
